events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The case has been labelled as a refund request due to the customer receiving an incorrect product.
Support agent Sarah has been assigned to handle the customer's refund request.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear you received the wrong item. I’m here to assist you with your refund.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so I can verify your claim?
My order number is 789654123, and I have attached a photo showing the wrong product arrived instead of what I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate a full refund to your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
Thanks for resolving this quickly. I appreciate the prompt refund offer and your help.
The refund process has been completed on our end. Please check your account for the credited amount.
We just wanted to check in and confirm that you received your refund and everything is satisfactory.
As the refund was successfully processed and confirmed, we are now closing this support case. Thank you!
